status: Processing Complete – Claim Accepted (Covered Peril: Water Damage)

logs.message: FNOL received via MGA Portal. Metadata extracted: submitter=Robert Miller (MGA), timestamp=2025-07-22T10:04:55Z, policy=CP-401-2345.
Parsed structured fields for water damage event at Tech Solutions Corp. Loss cause identified as burst pipe.
Identified uploaded maintenance ticket and preliminary incident notes. No photos or third-party reports included.
Loss location normalized: 2500 Sunset Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90026. Noted discrepancy with insured's HQ location.
No duplicate FNOLs or existing claims found for this incident.
Policy CP-401-2345 retrieved. Multi-location coverage confirmed. Water damage from sudden burst pipe is included.
Matched peril: Water Damage (Sudden/Accidental). No exclusions triggered. Branch office address covered under policy rider ML-EXT-17.
Premiums fully paid. No cancellations, lapses, or reinstatements.
Coverage integrity score: 91%. Strong alignment of covered peril and insured location extension.
Loss categorized as Major ($250K–$5M) due to server room involvement and electronics exposure.
No fraud markers identified. Plumbing maintenance logs confirm prior pipe integrity issues.
Field adjuster inspection recommended due to sensitive equipment damage. No CAT involvement.
Requested repair estimates, server diagnostics, moisture readings, and vendor quotes for cleanup services.
Revalidated cause of loss. Burst pipe confirmed. Loss location properly associated with policy extension.
Preliminary estimate: $310,000 including server hardware replacements and structural drying/remediation.
Initial reserve set at $330,000 including contingency for electronics testing and replacement.
Reserve exceeds adjuster authority. Senior Adjuster approval obtained. No anomalies flagged.
Final determination: Fully covered claim. Water damage validated and linked to sudden accidental pipe burst.
Preparing settlement options: Replacement Cost Value + Direct Pay to certified remediation vendor.
Claim FNOL-CP-401-2345-TSC ACCEPTED. MGA and insured notified. Claim routed to settlement operations.
